title: CALM, COOL, AND DRAGONS?? | One Piece Episode 54-55 Reaction
creator: Unknown
description: A reaction video covering both Episodes 54 and 55 of One Piece, focusing on the Calm Belt encounter and the revelation of Apis' secret with Ryu.

title: One Piece: Warship Island Arc (Filler) | Summary, Recap & Review
creator: Poggers Team
description: A comprehensive summary, recap, and review of the entire Warship Island Arc including Episode 55, discussing the filler arc's plot and reception.

title: 'One Piece Diaries' #6 – The Warship Island Arc
creator: Comic-Con
description: A diary-style review of the Warship Island Arc from someone watching One Piece for the first time. Notes that the arc 'wasn't the most exciting' but 'didn't really feel like a filler arc.'

title: Journey into the World of Pirates: Warship Island Arc
creator: AnimeTipz
description: A positive review of the Warship Island Arc stating 'in the warship Island Arc I thought it was an amazing filler.' The author appreciated the dragon elements and found it 'an incredible story arc.'

title: One Piece – Warship Island Arc Recap
creator: TV Tropes Community
description: TV Tropes recap page for the Warship Island Arc, including analysis of the arc's themes, characters, and the continuity issue with dragons appearing in a filler arc.

title: Episode 55 - One Piece Wiki
creator: One Piece Wiki Community
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 55 including episode summary, character appearances, debut information, and trivia.

title: Warship Island Arc - One Piece Wiki
creator: One Piece Wiki Community
description: Comprehensive wiki page for the entire Warship Island Arc including episode list, plot summary, and production notes revealing the arc was originally considered for a theatrical film.

title: Calm Belt - One Piece Wiki
creator: One Piece Wiki Community
description: Detailed wiki page about the Calm Belt, including its first appearance in Episode 55, geographical features, Sea Kings, and significance in the One Piece world.

title: Apis - One Piece Wiki

title: One Piece Filler Episodes and Arcs You Can Skip
creator: CBR Staff
description: Article discussing One Piece filler arcs including the Warship Island Arc. Notes that the arc 'was a great showing for what a One Piece filler arc could accomplish' and highlights elements that later became canon.
